assignments.name: Set_Has_Guarantor_and_Same_Legal_Address
assignments.label: Set Has Guarantor and Same Legal Address

decisions.name: Is_Agreement_Reseted_And
decisions.label: Is Agreement Reseted And Loan Status Return?

Flow.description: Hide NPWP for Corporate Reshow Domicile inputs for Corporate Order Profession

formulas.name: errorText_Guarantor_IDNumber
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(REGEX({!editor_Guarantor_ID}, "^[0-9]{16}$")), "Please input 16 digit number", IF( {!func_IsIDExist}, "ID number is already exist", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_Guarantor_Name
formulas.expression: IF(LEN({!editor_Guarantor_Name}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_Guarantor_Name}), "Please input the data in the correct format", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_Guarantor_Phone
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(REGEX({!editor_Guarantor_Mobile_Phone_Guarantor}, "^[0-9]+$")), LEN({!editor_Guarantor_Mobile_Phone_Guarantor}) < 6), "Please enter at least 6 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_Guarantor_Phone}), "Please input correct phone number", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_Guarantor_PlaceOfBirth
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_Guarantor_PlaceOfBirth} == FALSE, "Please input the data in the correct format", "")

formulas.name: func_Capital_GetKepemilikanAssetLainnya
formulas.expression: IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c}, "Rumah" ), "Rumah; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Ruko/Kios" ), "Ruko/Kios; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Apartemen" ), "Apartemen; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Pribadi" ), "Kendaraan Pribadi; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Operasional" ), "Kendaraan Operasional; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Mesin Produksi" ), "Mesin Produksi; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Gudang" ), "Gudang; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Tanah" ), "Tanah; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Aset Lainnya" ), "Aset Lainnya; ","" )

formulas.name: func_FinancialStatement_HPP
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}) == TRUE, "", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.HPP__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: func_Loan_GetDP
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!var_currOpty.DP__c}) == TRUE, "", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!var_currOpty.DP__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: funS_GuarantorMapLatitude
funS_GuarantorMapLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map}, FIND('@', {!editor_guarantor_Guarantor_Map})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

fields.name: Display_Structural
fields.fieldText:
Perubahan yang Anda lakukan termasuk kategori STRUKTURAL dan akan menyebabkan reset Proses Pengajuan.

fields.name: Display_Error
fields.fieldText: Status Loan sudah diluar Survey. Tidak dapat melakukan Add Data.

validationRule.errorMessage: Nominal yang diinput tidak boleh kurang dari Rp 1.000.000.
Silahkan input data Date of Birth Guarantor lebih besar atau sama dengan 18 tahun.

fields.name: display_DomicileKecamatan
fields.fieldText:
* Domicile Kecamatan :

{!funcGetSelectedLegalKecamatan}

textTemplates.name: tpl_Collateral_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!e866755d-ecd1-4ddc-9327-b59e75d4a03d.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_DomicileCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_guarantor_Domicile_Province_Guarantor.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_DomicileKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetDomicileCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_DomicileKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetDomicileKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_DomicileZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetDomicileKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_GetIndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetIndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!editor_Guarantor_Economy_Sector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_LegalCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_Legal_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_LegalKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetLegalCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_LegalKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetLegalKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Guarantor_LegalZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_Guarantor_GetLegalKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_PemilikSertipikat_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!5c8a6b34-ec5d-4c20-ba64-b4251064f9a2.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_PurposeOfFinancing
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from Purpose_Financing__c where code__c = '{!4b9eef97-7839-423c-aff5-0ee3abcb0e45.firstRetrievedRecord.Purpose_of_Financing__c}' ORDER BY Name ASC

textTemplates.name: tpl_WayOfFinancing
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name from Way_of_Financing__c where code__c = '{!4b9eef97-7839-423c-aff5-0ee3abcb0e45.firstRetrievedRecord.Way_of_Financing__c}' ORDER BY Name ASC
